oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Unravelling institutional determinants affecting change in agriculture in West Africa
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: P.C. Struik
L. Klerkx
D. Hounkonnou
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper compares lessons learned from nine studies that explored institutional determinants of innovation towards sustainable intensification of West African agriculture. The studies investigated issues relating to crop, animal, and resources management in Benin, Ghana, and Mali
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: action research
